system.description:
Art District Hub Move

When you organize a protest, roll with a Circle of fellow organizers.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: Someone you trusted leaks your secrets to a dangerous foe.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value: Your protest puts pressure on a powerful NPC of your choice; they take -1 ongoing through next faction turn.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value: Your protest puts pressure on a powerful NPC of your choice; they take -1 ongoing through next faction turn. Additionally, the leader of another faction takes interest and delivers a Debt, powerful resources, or secret information.
